title: AB de Royse777
author: AB de Royse777
created_time: February 22, 2023, 11:29:20 PMLast edit: August 14, 2024, 06:10:29 AM by AB de Royse777
content: ABOUT THE CAMPAIGNSherbet.com is an all-new cryptocurrency casino, and they want to advertise Bitcoin Talk via an extensive signature campaign. Their goal is to build brand trust and loyalty over an initial campaign that they expect to last the next 3-6 months. As a member of this campaign, you are encouraged to make discussions, leave suggestions on other threads, and share your experience on Sherbet on their ANN thread.As the campaign manager, I hold marketing budget and every week I update existing balance. When you are joining the campaign, please read the latest post to know escrow balance. If there are not enough balance for coming weeks then join at your own risk however it's always expected the when funds are not sufficient the management will top up the escrow balance.CAMPAIGN REWARDS Legendary: $4.00 per post up to 25 posts each week.Hero: $2.80 per post up to 25 posts each week.Sr. Member: $2.40 per post up to 25 posts each week.Full Member: $1.60 per post up to 25 posts each week.EXTRA BONUS▶️ Each week, I will pick three of the best-quality posters to win $30 each.▶️ To be eligible for this bonus, you must reach the minimum campaign requirements.▶️ Only gambling section posts will be eligible for this bonus.▶️ The more you post, the higher your chances are of winning the bonus.PREVENT AI DOMINATIONThis campaign is protected by Prevent AI Domination terms defined here:💹📈 Bitcointalk Campaign Management 💪🔥 Signature & Bounty. ▶️ If I find campaign members breaching these terms, I will remove them from the campaign immediately. ▶️ If you find AI-written posts for this campaign and report them to me publicly or via PM, you will receive the weekly payment instead of the accused campaigner (if your report was successful). Please include as much evidence as possible when submitting a report.CAMPAIGN RULES▶️ Wear the appropriate signature and avatar during the campaign▶️ Wear personal text: Sherbet.com - The #1 Social Casino & Sportsbook▶️ Minimum of five posts in the "Gambling" and "Gambling Discussion" sections▶️ Posts must be minimum of 150 characters long and constructive▶️ Posts in the following boards/sections are not eligible: "Off-Topic", "Archival, Games & Rounds", "Investor-Based Games", "Wall Observers", "Serious Discussion", "Altcoin Discussion", "Lending", "Press", "Politics & Society", other signature campaign threads, including this one, any ANN threads (ANN posted on the "Gambling" board are allowed), and areas where the signature is not visible▶️ No valid negative from DT network unless pre-approved by me▶️ Multi-account (alts) can apply but will need to give up all except only one if accepted more than one.▶️ You must have minimum five merits in the last 120 days▶️ Join my Telegram group: https://t.me/R7BountyQAIMPORTANT INFORMATION▶️ You are not allowed to change anything on the signature code. If you edit the signature code, I will disqualify you immediately▶️ I reserve the full right to add/remove any participants, push/cancel/reopen the campaign, or edit any rules of this campaign▶️ The week starts on Saturday and ends on Friday (UTC)▶️ Please check the spreadsheet comment column and your payment information regularly.HOW TO APPLYReply to this thread with the following informationCode:Current number of posts (including this one):Rank:Bech32 address:Merit earned in the last 120 days:..SPREADSHEET..AVATARLink : https://talkimg.com/images/2023/05/28/255fd5f1f0890216b0a01254b6deffb1.jpegSIGNATURESHEOR/LEGENDARYCode:[center][table][tr][td][url=https://sherbet.com/affiliate/casinocritique][size=2pt][tt][color=#7b54e9]████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████   ▐███████████▀▀   ▀▀████▀▀▀▀   ▐██████████   ▄▄▄    ██▄          ██████   ██▀▀▀    ████    ▄▄▄███████▄      ▄▄▄██████   ▐███████████▄▄▄██████████████████████████████▀  ▀████████▀  ▀███████████████▄    ▀▀▀▀    ▄███████████████████▄▄▄▄▄▄▄▄███████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████[/td][td][size=1px].[size=24pt][url=https://sherbet.com/affiliate/casinocritique][font=Arial Black][color=transparent][glow=#7b54e9,2].[size=8pt][sup][size=19pt][color=#fff]Sherbet[/color][/sup][/size].[/td][td][/td][td][center][url=https://sherbet.com/affiliate/casinocritique][font=arial black][size=5pt][color=#ccc]NFT[color=transparent]...[/color]-[color=transparent]...[/color]CASINO[color=transparent]...[/color]-[color=transparent]...[/color]NFT[color=transparent]...[/color]-[color=transparent]...[/color]CASINO[color=transparent]...[/color]-[color=transparent]...[/color]NFT[color=transparent]...[/color]-[color=transparent]...[/color]CAS[/color][/size][size=8pt][color=#113]EXPERIENCE [glow=#75e,2,300][color=#75e]..[color=#fff]GAMBLING[/color]..[/color][/glow][i]LIKE NEVER BEFORE[/i][/color][/size][size=5pt][color=#ccc]INO   -
